proj.zoie.api
接口 DocIDMapper<T>

所有已知实现类：
DefaultDocIDMapperFactory.DefaultDocIDMapper, DocIDMapperImpl, InRangeDocIDMapperFactory.DocIDMapperGlobal, InRangeDocIDMapperFactory.DocIDMapperSmall, InRangeDocIDMapperFactory.DocIDMapperSub, NullDocIDMapper
public interface DocIDMapper<T>

Maps a UID to the internal docid.
